request.description: Get meal plans for a diet plan
Create a new meal plan for a diet plan

body.raw:
{
    "meal_type": "breakfast",
    "title": "Spinach and Mushroom Omelette with Whole Grain Toast",
    "description": "A protein-rich breakfast with egg whites, spinach, mushrooms, and spices. Served with whole grain toast.",
    "calories": 350,
    "protein_grams": 25,
    "carbs_grams": 35,
    "fats_grams": 12,
    "time_of_day": "08:00:00",
    "recipes": {
        "ingredients": [
            "3 egg whites",
            "1 whole egg",
            "1 cup fresh spinach, chopped",
            "1/2 cup mushrooms, sliced",
            "1 small onion, finely diced",
            "1 tsp olive oil",
            "1/4 tsp turmeric powder",
            "1/4 tsp black pepper",
            "Salt to taste",
            "1 slice whole grain bread"
        ],
        "instructions": [
            "Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat",
            "Sauté onions until translucent, about 2 minutes",
            "Add mushrooms and cook until soft, about 3 minutes",
            "Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 minute",
            "Beat eggs in a bowl with turmeric, black pepper, and salt",
            "Pour egg mixture over vegetables and cook until set",
            "Fold omelette in half and cook for another minute",
            "Toast the whole grain bread and serve alongside the omelette"
        ]
    }
}

request.description: Create a new meal for a meal plan
Start a new assessment for a user
Mark assessment as complete and trigger plan creation

Get list of publicly available subscription plans

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Starter Plan",
    "code": "starter",
    "description": "Basic plan for small gyms with up to 50 clients.",
    "monthly_price": 49.99,
    "quarterly_price": 134.97,
    "annual_price": 479.90,
    "features": {
        "max_clients": 50,
        "max_diet_plans": 2,
        "ai_meal_generation": true,
        "ai_meal_generation_limit": 50
    },
    "is_active": true
}
